verses.verse: "You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H251>countryman<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H7716>sheep<s%> <S%H5080>straying<s%> <S%H5080>away,<s%> and <S%H5956>pay<s%> <S%H5956>no<s%> <S%H5956>attention<s%> to them; you shall <S%H7725>certainly<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> to your countryman.

"And <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H251>countryman<s%> is not <S%H7138>near<s%> you, or if you do not <S%H3045>know<s%> him, then you shall <S%H622>bring<s%> it <S%H8432>home<s%> to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>remain<s%> with you <S%H5704>until<s%> your <S%H251>countryman<s%> <S%H1875>looks<s%> for it; then you shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to him.

"And <S%H3651>thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H3651>same<s%> with his <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise<s%> with <S%H3605>anything<s%> lost by your <S%H9>countryman,<s%> <S%H251>which<s%> he has lost and you have <S%H834>found.<s%> You are not <S%H6>allowed<s%> to <S%H4672>neglect<s%> [them.]

"You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> your countryman's <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> on the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H5956>pay<s%> <S%H5956>no<s%> <S%H5956>attention<s%> to them; you shall <S%H6965>certainly<s%> <S%H6965>help<s%> him to <S%H6965>raise<s%> [them] up.

"A <S%H802>woman<s%> shall not <S%H1961>wear<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1397>man<s%>'s <S%H3627>clothing,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall a man <S%H3847>put<s%> on a woman's <S%H8071>clothing;<s%> for <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H7122>happen<s%> to <S%H7122>come<s%> upon a bird's <S%H7064>nest<s%> along the <S%H1870>way,<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> with <S%H667>young<s%> <S%H667>ones<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> and the <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H7257>sitting<s%> on the <S%H667>young<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> on the <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> with the <S%H1121>young;<s%>

you shall <S%H7971>certainly<s%> <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> but the <S%H1121>young<s%> you may <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourself, in <S%H4616>order<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4624>parapet<s%> for your <S%H1406>roof,<s%> that you may not <S%H7760>bring<s%> <S%H1818>bloodguilt<s%> on your <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H5307>anyone<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> from it.

"You shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> with <S%H3610>two<s%> <S%H3610>kinds<s%> of seed, <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H4395>all<s%> the <S%H4395>produce<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> <S%H6942>become<s%> <S%H6942>defiled.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H9177>plow<s%> with an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8162>material<s%> <S%H8162>mixed<s%> of <S%H6785>wool<s%> and <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>
"You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> yourself <S%H1434>tassels<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of your <S%H3682>garment<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3680>cover<s%> yourself.
<S%H3588>"If<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H935>goes<s%> in to her and [then] <S%H8130>turns<s%> <S%H8130>against<s%> her,

and <S%H7760>charges<s%> her with <S%H5949>shameful<s%> <S%H1697>deeds<s%> and <S%H3318>publicly<s%> <S%H8034>defames<s%> <S%H7451><s%> <S%H3318><s%> her, and <S%H559>says,<s%> 'I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> [but] when I <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> her, I did not <S%H4672>find<s%> her a <S%H1331>virgin,<s%>'

then the girl's father and her <S%H1>mother<s%> shall <S%H517>take<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> out the [evidence] of the girl's <S%H3318>virginity<s%> to the <S%H1331>elders<s%> of the <S%H2205>city<s%> at the <S%H5892>gate.<s%>

"And the girl's father shall <S%H1>say<s%> to the <S%H559>elders,<s%> 'I <S%H2205>gave<s%> my <S%H5414>daughter<s%> to <S%H1323>this<s%> <S%H2088>man<s%> for a <S%H376>wife,<s%> but he <S%H802>turned<s%> <S%H8130>against<s%> her;

and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he has <S%H7760>charged<s%> her with <S%H5949>shameful<s%> <S%H1697>deeds,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I did not <S%H4672>find<s%> your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> a <S%H1331>virgin.<s%>" But <S%H428>this<s%> is the [evidence] of my daughter's <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>' And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H8071>garment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
"So the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H3256>chastise<s%> him,

and they shall <S%H6064>fine<s%> him a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [shekels] of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the girl's father, <S%H1>because<s%> he <S%H3588>publicly<s%> <S%H3318>defamed<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H7451><s%> a <S%H3318>virgin<s%> of <S%H1330>Israel.<s%> And she shall <S%H3478>remain<s%> his <S%H1961>wife;<s%> he <S%H802>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808>divorce<s%> her <S%H7971>all<s%> his <S%H3605>days.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>charge<s%> is <S%H571>true,<s%> that the <S%H5291>girl<s%> was not <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1331>virgin,<s%>

then they shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H5291>girl<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of her father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of her <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> her to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she has <S%H6213>committed<s%> an <S%H5039>act<s%> of <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by <S%H2181>playing<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in her father's <S%H1004>house;<s%> thus you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7901>lying<s%> with a <S%H1166>married<s%> <S%H1167><s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> then <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of them shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H7901>lay<s%> with the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman;<s%> thus you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> there is a <S%H5291>girl<s%> who is a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H781>engaged<s%> to a <S%H376>man,<s%> and [another] <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> her in the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her,

then you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H8147>both<s%> out to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> and you shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them to <S%H4191>death;<s%> the <S%H5291>girl,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> she did not <S%H6817>cry<s%> out in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> he has <S%H6031>violated<s%> his neighbor's <S%H802>wife.<s%> Thus you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> the <S%H5291>girl<s%> who is <S%H781>engaged,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>forces<s%> her and <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her, then <S%H905>only<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> to the <S%H5291>girl;<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> in the <S%H5291>girl<s%> worthy of <S%H4194>death,<s%> for <S%H3152>just<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and <S%H7523>murders<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>case.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> he <S%H4672>found<s%> her in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> the <S%H781>engaged<s%> <S%H5291>girl<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> out, but <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> one to <S%H3467>save<s%> her.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> a <S%H5291>girl<s%> who is a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not <S%H781>engaged,<s%> and <S%H8610>seizes<s%> her and <S%H7901>lies<s%> with her and they are <S%H4672>discovered,<s%>

then the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the girl's father <S%H1>fifty<s%> [shekels] of <S%H2572>silver,<s%> and she shall <S%H3701>become<s%> his <S%H1961>wife<s%> <S%H802>because<s%> <S%H8478><s%> he has <S%H834>violated<s%> her; he <S%H6031>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808>divorce<s%> her <S%H7971>all<s%> his <S%H3605>days.<s%>
"A <S%H376>man<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> his father's <S%H802>wife<s%> so that he shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his father's <S%H3671>skirt.<s%>
